channel.title: I am totally unknowledgeable-quick question
channel.description:
Alright, so when trying to Edit the itemdef .xml file in the server folder, this is what I have been doing: I extract the itemdef file, and then edit an items name(I'm just testing this). After that I am sort of confused as what to do. I end up with one itemDef.xml(it says its GZ?) file and one Itemdef file that can be read in notepad. It says it's Xml though, however it doesnt have .xml after it.
I cant figure out what to do next, do I compile it? or what? I have 7zip. I'm sorry I realize that this is a total n00b question probably asked many times. I know since I extracted it I probably have to convert it back to the type of file it was before extraction, but a, clueless as how to do this.
HELP

item.title: I am totally unknowledgeable-quick question
item.dc:creator: @ismellaprep ismellaprep
item.description:
@ismellaprep wrote:

After the extraction and edit what do I do? Do I need to convert them back to something? Or compile?

–Alright, so when trying to Edit the itemdef .xml file in the server folder, this is what I have been doing:
I extract the itemdef file, and then edit an items name(I’m just testing this). After that I am sort of confused as what to do. I end up with one itemDef.xml(it says its GZ?) file and one Itemdef file that can be read in notepad. It says it’s Xml though, however it doesnt have .xml after it.

I cant figure out what to do next, do I compile it? or what? I have 7zip. I’m sorry I realize that this is a total n00b question probably asked many times. I know since I extracted it I probably have to convert it back to the type of file it was before extraction, but a, clueless as how to do this.

HELP

item.description:
@dear_god1 wrote:

you have to extract the .rscd files with winRAR or 7zip.

item.title: I am totally unknowledgeable-quick question
item.dc:creator: @Old_Rsc_Player Old Rsc Player
item.description:
@Old_Rsc_Player wrote:

Download 7 zip.

I guess look into some youtube videos for help (im not at my house)
http://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=7+zip&search_type=

Read full topic

item.title: I am totally unknowledgeable-quick question
item.dc:creator: @ismellaprep ismellaprep
item.description:
@ismellaprep wrote:

Yeah I’ve been using EasyRSC. It’s pretty easy actually, that Yong Ming guy has a REALLY good guide.

Using EasyRsc am I able to make certain points where Npc’s walk around and stuff? I didn’t read through his whole guide so didn’t see if there was a part on that. Say in Draynor for some odd reason I wouldnt a KBD that will always be there, unless he his killed but he will still respawn.

Using EasyRsc am I capable of doing that? Thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 17, 2009, 02:31:47 pm[/size][hr]Alright I concluded I AM able to do that. Here is my current issue(I figure it doesn’t matter if I post it, as this thread has kind of ended up useless anyways)

“Please note: Anything changed in the .xml files will need to be compressed using either the Compression Tool or 7-zip. You will also need to edit files client side in order for the edits to work correctly.”

I have trouble compressing them. I dont know where exactly do put Compression Tool. Also, I have no trouble Editing the .xml but it’s the clientside I have issues with. Say I edited servers itemdefs.xml and had to edit clientside now, I go to items RSCD and when I open it using Notepad it’s just a bunch of ALT codes. What program do I need to edit clientside files?

Read full topic

item.title: I am totally unknowledgeable-quick question
item.dc:creator: @Old_Rsc_Player Old Rsc Player
item.description:
@Old_Rsc_Player wrote:

well since ur not here to develop or anything and u just want to item edit.
go with easyrsc.
